title: Slayer task/Dogs

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dogs can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael, Spria and Mazchna at level 15 combat. A wide variety of dogs can be found across Gielinor. Most dogs, except those in Brimhaven Dungeon, are aggressive and they all attack with melee. Dogs have no noteworthy drops beside bones and ensouled dog heads.

Dogs

Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Dogs can be assigned as a slayer task from Turael, Spria and Mazchna at level 15 combat. A wide variety of dogs can be found across Gielinor. Most dogs, except those in Brimhaven Dungeon, are aggressive and they all attack with melee. Dogs have no noteworthy drops beside bones and ensouled dog heads.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Jackal 21 27
  • Southern Kharidian Desert
  • Lowest level variety of dog. Requires some protection from the desert heat.
Temple guardian 30 45
  • Paterdomus
  • Fought during Priest in Peril, can only be fought once.
Guard dog 44 49
  • Brimhaven, Black Arm Gang hideout
  • Handelmort Mansion
  • Hosidius marketplace
  • Kourend Castle
  • McGrubor's Wood
  • Usually found in urban or enclosed areas. Will attack players stealing from stalls.
  • Black Arm Gang hideout in Brimhaven requires partial completion of Heroes' Quest.
Wild dog 63 62
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Brimhaven Dungeon requires an axe and 875 coins to access Brimhaven Dungeon (unless player has paid for unlimited access from Saniboch or Banisoch). Found in places with other powerful creatures nearby, including bronze dragons.
  • A single wild dog can be found on the western-most dock in Rellekka.
Shadow hound 63 62
  • Eastern part of Shadow Dungeon
  • Requires Ring of visibility and partial completion of Desert Treasure to access. Other creatures are able to walk through them.
Reanimated dog N/A 35
  • Dark Altar
  • Requires 60% Arceuus favour to access Arceuus spellbook. Requires ensouled dog head, 1Soul rune, 3Nature rune, and 4Body rune and level 41 Magic to cast Adept Reanimation, the spell must be cast at the Dark Altar, unless it is cast, when the ensouled head is received as a drop.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespotable Notes
Hosidius marketplace 6 Guard dogs No Yes Yes
  • Bakery stalls and Fruit stalls nearby to recover health. Dogs will attack if they catch you stealing.
West of Nardah 7 Jackals No Yes Unknown
  • Requires some protection from the desert heat.
Central Brimhaven Dungeon 8 Wild dogs No Yes Yes
  • Requires an axe and paid access to Brimhaven Dungeon.
Handelmort Mansion in East Ardougne 4 Guard dogs No No Yes

Exceptions[edit | edit source]

  • Hellhounds of any variety do not count towards the task.
  • Terror dogs also do not count towards it either.

Dogs can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] from [[Turael]], [[Spria]] and [[Mazchna]] at level 15 [[combat]]. A wide variety of dogs can be found across [[Gielinor]]. Most dogs, except those in [[Brimhaven Dungeon]], are [[aggressive]] and they all attack with [[melee]]. Dogs have no noteworthy drops beside [[bones]] and [[ensouled dog head]]s.
